name: Curse of Humanity
description:
Oh hell no, another high school romance novel? What? there is no romance? What is the point then? Maybe coming of age story? NO?!What do you mean it has things supernautral??? With no romance??? what do you mean YET?

Hello,
Thank you very much for visiting this page. This game is a little passion project for me. I would be happy for any comments, good or bad, as long as it has some input on how to make the game better. This is the first game that I have ever made, so I'm sorry if things are not professional enough. However, I'm learning and I am trying to improve it.
I only hope that you will like the story my messed up mind came up with, and that it will be interesting enough for you to want to know what is going on ^.^

Thank you.

------------------Synopsis--------------------------------

Makoto is a high school student who has just started his first year at a new school. Eager to leave his difficult past behind, he's determined to make the most of this fresh start. But strange occurrences seem to be haunting him from day one, making him question his own sanity. Is it all just in his head, or is there something truly mysterious happening around him?

Join Makoto on his quest for answers as he navigates the treacherous waters of high school, and be prepared for an unforgettable adventure full of twists and turns. But be warned: in a world where nothing is as it seems, survival may be the ultimate challenge.
